$interpreted: Angelia: OW!
Cautious Kidnapper: Watch it. She's not to be harmed.
Irritable Kidnapper: Orders the princess' kidnapping, yet demands to give her the royal treatment. What does he think this is...?
Cautious Kidnapper: Quit your whining. Where are the others?
Angelia: (...Can't harm me? Who hired them?)
Irritable Kidnapper: Hey, this isn't going to plan. The other crew members haven't returned.
Nervous Kidnapper: What a world...you stay here and watch the princess. I'm going to check it out!
Angelia: (...What should I do now? Wait for someone to rescue me?)
Angelia: (...No, I can't cause trouble for anyone else.)
Angelia: (It's only one kidnapper, it's now or never...)
Angelia: Silks from the castle? Only nobles own these. Why does he have them?!
Angelia: Perhaps it's an important clue. Better bring it with me.
Soldier: Her Highness?! You're Princess Angelia?
Angelia: And you are?
Soldier: I'm a subordinate of Colonel Levon, everyone's been looking for you......
Irritable Kidnapper: ...DON'T RUN!
Irritable Kidnapper: Hell, I've been hit...
Soldier: Your Highness! Hide! I'll take it from here!
Angelia: Let me help.
Angelia: We must escape now.
Soldier: Of course. This way please, Your Highness.
Soldier: Whoa!
Angelia: NO!
Angelia: AHH!
Irritable Kidnapper: You harlot, YOU......
Cautious Kidnapper: Stop this instant! Did you forget our orders?
Irritable Kidnapper: â€¦Hmph!
Irritable Kidnapper: Where's the cleanup crew?
Cautious Kidnapper: Snatched by the Royal Infantry,
Cautious Kidnapper: a female archer, and another silver-haired bodyguard.
Angelia: (...That's Naya and Sione...they're still searching for me...)
Cautious Kidnapper: They took their own lives quietly. No word escaped their lips.
Irritable Kidnapper: Good. Our hideout is hidden deep. If she didn't run out, we would never have been discovered in the first place.
Angelia: (...I-I can't give up, there must be something that I can do...)
Irritable Kidnapper: Hide the corpses and get rid of the blood. I'm taking the princess back.
Irritable Kidnapper: Master's coming soon. Once we collect the money, we pretend nothing ever happened.
Cautious Kidnapper: Got it.
Angelia: (...Please, I'm counting on you. Naya, Sione...)

Watch it. She's not to be harmed.
Orders the princess' kidnapping, yet demands to give her the royal treatment. What does he think this is...?
Quit your whining. Where are the others?
(...Can't harm me? Who hired them?)

Let me help.

Of course. This way please, Your Highness.
Whoa!
NO!
AHH!
You harlot, YOU......
Stop this instant! Did you forget our orders?
â€¦Hmph!
Where's the cleanup crew?
Snatched by the Royal Infantry,
a female archer, and another silver-haired bodyguard.
(...That's Naya and Sione...they're still searching for me...)
They took their own lives quietly. No word escaped their lips.
Good. Our hideout is hidden deep. If she didn't run out, we would never have been discovered in the first place.
(...I-I can't give up, there must be something that I can do...)
Hide the corpses and get rid of the blood. I'm taking the princess back.
Master's coming soon. Once we collect the money, we pretend nothing ever happened.
Got it.
(...Please, I'm counting on you. Naya, Sione...)
